name: Bare Market
goods: Organic and low pagaging bulk, produce and household items
alt: wood brushes in jars with the text 'Bare Market, package-free goods + grocery'
Details: Order online, they package and sanitize everything. Pickups are booked in 10 minute slots to keep the number of patrons to a maxiumum of 5 at a time.

name: Kendal Hills Virtual Farmer's Market
goods: Sustainable meat, dairy, produce, coffee, prepared meals, etc direct from local farmers
alt: grid of images of available products for sale
neighbourhood: GTA, check website for delivery to your area
Details: Virtual market from a dozen local farmers, restocked Thursdays at noon, $4.50 delivery fee, orders taken Thurs 12pm - Sun 12am. Option to watch and tip local musicans while delivery is on the way.

name: Rowe Farms
goods: Sustainably grown, locally raised, minimally processed, organic meat.
alt: Farmer in a field talking to on-lookers
neighbourhood: GTA, check website for delivery to your area
Details: Now offering online order with delivery, store will email you on day of delivery to inquire about add ons like dairy and organic produce

name: Coffeecology
goods: Sustainably grown, locally raised, minimally processed, organic meat.
alt: Coffee beans in glass mason jars on a shelf
neighbourhood: GTA, check website for delivery and retail in your area
Details: Now offering online order with delivery, store will email you on day of delivery to inquire about add ons like dairy and organic produce

name: Arva Flour Mills
goods: Local natural heritage flour from non GMO wheat, no preservatives or undesirable commercial additives
neighbourhood: GTA, check website for delivery to your area
Details: Small batch sustainable flour mill delivers to your door. Flour should be frozen if it will not be used in ~30 days.
